channel.title: retail industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in retail industry on FinanClub

item.title: KSS
item.description: score:19 Chances: Kohl’s beats profit estimates on cost cuts and leaner inventory. Earnings surpass estimates, maintains full-year guidance. Strategic efforts aiding growth in Kohl’s. Back-to-school shopping convenience and affordable prices. Positive takeaways from Q2 earnings call. Risks: Profits plunge more than 50% annually on weak sales.

item.title: VFC
item.description: score:14 Chances: Appointment of experienced executives to key positions. Potential growth efforts to aid the company in a tough environment. Positive analyst sentiment and upbeat potential for the new CEO. Releasing new products and categories for brand expansion. Maintaining earnings outlook and making strategic changes.
